description: Ask a home buyer to describe their dream house, and they probably won't begin with the height of the basement ceiling or the proximity to an east-west railroad. But this playground competition's dataset proves that much more influences price negotiations than the number of bedrooms or a white-picket fence. With 79 explanatory variables describing (almost) every aspect of residential homes in Ames, Iowa, this competition challenges you to predict the final price of each home.
goal: Predict house prices based on various property features.
persona: Real estate price evaluator or data analyst.

indicator_list.name: missing_inconsistent_data
indicator_list.description: Identify missing values in important fields such as LotFrontage, GarageType, and PoolQC.
indicator_list.threshold: Rows with more than 10% missing values in key fields should be flagged for review.

indicator_list.name: lot_size_outliers
indicator_list.description: Detect properties with unusually large or small lot areas compared to the average.
indicator_list.threshold: Properties with lot areas more than 3 standard deviations from the mean should be flagged.

indicator_list.name: year_built_inconsistencies
indicator_list.description: Check for properties with YearBuilt or YearRemodAdd that are inconsistent with the overall property condition.
indicator_list.threshold: Properties with high-quality ratings but built before 1900 should be reviewed.

indicator_list.name: sale_price_outliers
indicator_list.description: Identify properties with sale prices significantly higher or lower than the market average.
indicator_list.threshold: Properties with prices beyond 2.5 standard deviations from the mean should be flagged for investigation.

indicator_list.name: garage_and_parking_anomalies
indicator_list.description: Check properties for missing or inconsistent data on garage size, type, or year built.
indicator_list.threshold: Flag properties missing critical garage data or where the garage size is inconsistent with the property size.

indicator_list.name: age_vs_renovation_discrepancy
indicator_list.description: Identify properties where the age of the house and year of renovation show large discrepancies.
indicator_list.threshold: Review properties where the gap between YearBuilt and YearRemodAdd is more than 50 years.

indicator_list.name: neighborhood_price_trends
indicator_list.description: Analyze properties in neighborhoods with unusual pricing patterns.
indicator_list.threshold: Flag properties where the price is more than 30% above or below the neighborhood average.
